text: Joan Barril i Cuixart (20 January 1952 - 13 December 2014) was a Spanish journalist and writer. He was born in Barcelona, Spain. He was known for his writing columns in El País, La Vanguardia and in El Periódico de Catalunya. Barril died in Barcelona, Spain from pneumonia, aged 62.
